name: My Horse Club: On the Trail of the Mysterious Appaloosa
overview: A Game For Horse Lovers With A Sense Of Adventure Discover the secret of the mysterious Appaloosa while horseback riding, western style in gorgeous surroundings. Key Features: * Discover and ride over 30 of the most popular breeds of horses – Friesian, Arabian Thoroughbred, American Quarter Horse, French Saddle and many more. * Take a fascinating journey around the world – explore America’s West, Canada, Spain, Morocco… * Complete 45 exciting challenges including cross country, show jumping, training and western riding. * Take regular care of your horses regularly to gain their trust – brush them, train them and share special moments with them. * Build a unique relationship with your horse. * Lead your horse on incredible rides with your Wii Remote™ and Nunchuk™.
